translations: 维护；证明……无辜；证明……正确

sentences.sentence: He tried hard to vindicate his honor.
sentences.translation: 他拼命维护自己的名誉。

sentences.sentence: The 2010 harvest did not seem to vindicate his judg we are pirates, these data are stolen from youdao .
sentences.translation: 但2010年的收成却似乎不能佐证其判断。

sentences.sentence: Save me, o God, by your name; vindicate me by your might.
sentences.translation: 用丝弦的乐器。神阿，求你以你的名救我，凭你的大能为我伸冤。
